Member Function Documentation

virtual QString icomp::IComponentEnvironmentManager::GetConfigFilePath ( ) const [pure virtual]

Get file path of real used config file.

If no config file was used, it returns empty string.

Implemented in icmpstr::CPackagesLoaderComp, and icomp::CEnvironmentManagerBase.
